definitions: a light placed at the side of something

examples.text: a designer village with sidelights along the pathways

shortDefinitions: light placed at side of something

definitions: a ship's port (red) and starboard (green) navigation lights.
natural light coming from the side

examples.text: through the window blazed the cold light of winter morning; sidelight, the most harsh

definitions: a narrow window or pane of glass set alongside a door or larger window

examples.text: we added French doors with sidelights and a fanlight overhead

shortDefinitions: narrow window or pane of glass set alongside door or larger window

definitions: a piece of incidental information that helps to clarify or enliven a subject

examples.text: one has to wade through pages of extraneous material in order to discover these sidelights on the management of an estate

shortDefinitions: piece of incidental information that helps to clarify or enliven subject
